mapper.sql: id, order_time, order_remark, order_meal_fee, order_pay_status, order_dis_fee, order_pre_amount, order_sum, order_status, user_name, user_address, user_telephone, client_name, client_address, client_telephone
mapper.select: select orders.id, order_status from orders inner join user_order on user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and order_id = orders.id
mapper.insert: insert into orders (id, order_time, order_remark, order_meal_fee, order_pay_status, order_dis_fee, order_pre_amount, order_sum, order_status, user_name, user_address, user_telephone, client_name, client_address, client_telephone, order_content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderMealFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderDisFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderPreAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into user_order (user_id, order_id,send_time,accept_time,enter_queue_time,start_print_time, print_result_time,bulkid,bulkindex,exec_send_time,exec_enter_queue_time,exec_start_time,exec_print_result_time, exec_accept_time) values (#{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sendTime}, #{acceptTime}, #{enterQueueTime}, #{startPrintTime}, #{printResultTime}, #{bulkId}, #{bulkIndex}, #{execSendTime}, #{execEnterQueueTime}, #{execStartPrintTime}, #{execPrintResultTime}, #{execAcceptTime})
mapper.update:
update orders
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_remark = #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_meal_fee = #{orderMealFee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_pay_status = #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
order_dis_fee = #{orderDisFee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_pre_amount = #{orderPreAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_sum = #{orderSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_telephone = #{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_address = #{clientAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_telephone = #{clientTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_content = #{orderContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders set order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_remark = #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_meal_fee = #{orderMealFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_pay_status = #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_dis_fee = #{orderDisFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_pre_amount = #{orderPreAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_sum = #{orderSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_telephone = #{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_address = #{clientAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_telephone = #{clientTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_content = #{orderContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update orders set order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_remark = #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_meal_fee = #{orderMealFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_pay_status = #{orderPayStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_dis_fee = #{orderDisFee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_pre_amount = #{orderPreAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_sum = #{orderSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_address = #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_telephone = #{userTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_name = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_address = #{clientAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_telephone = #{clientTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT o.id, bulkid, bulkindex,send_time,accept_time,enter_queue_time, start_print_time,print_result_time, exec_send_time,exec_enter_queue_time, exec_start_time,exec_print_result_time,exec_accept_time,o.order_status FROM user_order AS uo INNER JOIN orders AS o ON o.id = uo.order_id WHERE uo.user_id = #{0} AND uo.order_id = #{1}
